name: chrome-extension-boilerplate
description: Minimal boilerplate code to start your chrome extension

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:code && npm run copy:static
scripts.build:code: parcel build src/popup/index.html src/background/hotReload.ts src/background/background.ts src/content/contentScript.ts src/styles/index.css
scripts.watch:code: parcel watch src/popup/index.html src/background/background.ts src/content/contentScript.ts src/styles/index.css
